column2: Elf of Nargothrond]] who, according to the [[Grey Annals]], met [[Túrin]] after the [[Battle of Tumhalad]] ({{FA
column3: 495}}) when they were hurrying back to [[Nargothrond]] and leaves were falling from trees in a great wind. Ornil said to Túrin: "Even so fall the people of Nargothrond, but them there shall come no Spring."<ref>{{GA
column4: 277}}</ref> Nothing more is known of him.
